alert.note: Alert for Eastern Monmouth; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued January 13 at 3:58AM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...One to two feet of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Western Monmouth and Eastern Monmouth. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...At this level, widespread roadway flooding occurs in coastal and bayside communities and along inland tidal waterways. Many roads become impassable. Some damage to vulnerable structures may begin to occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong southerly winds are forecast to continue early this morning, which is forecast to lead to moderate flooding impacts with the high tide cycle. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Sandy Hook Bay at Sandy Hook MLLW Categories - Minor 6.7 ft, Moderate 7.7 ft, Major 8.7 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 13/09 AM 8.0 2.8 2.2 Moderate 13/09 PM 4.7 -0.5 0.0 None 14/10 AM 6.0 0.8 0.4 None 14/10 PM 4.6 -0.6 -0.2 None 15/11 AM 5.9 0.7 0.5 None 15/11 PM 5.6 0.4 0.8 None Watson Creek at Manasquan MLLW Categories - Minor 5.7 ft, Moderate 6.7 ft, Major 7.7 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 13/08 AM 7.2 2.8 2.1 Moderate 13/09 PM 4.6 0.2 0.3 None 14/10 AM 5.3 0.9 0.2 None 14/10 PM 4.0 -0.4 -0.3 None 15/11 AM 5.0 0.6 0.2 None 15/11 PM 4.9 0.5 0.5 None &&
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
